tswitem.name: Mercurial Augment Resonator
tswitem.tooltip:
Mercurial Augment Resonator
An unattuned support augment.
Resonating this augment to an active ability will decrease the duration of the currently running recharge timers on your team by 2%/ 4%/ 6%/ 8%/ 10% when you activate this ability. This can only happen every 10 seconds.
To attune this augment, place it in the assembly window with:
  • 4 Attuned Curing Augment Resonators
  • 120 Pure metal
